hiveArticle.title: Tuesday LandScapePhotography  - 1st Entry : Farm Land in Coorg
hiveArticle.body:
### <center>This is my first entry to the landscape photography contest by @juliank </center>
###

<hr>

In this picture, I wanted to capture the farm land along with beautiful surroundings (mountains covered with clouds). This photo was taken on my recent visit to [Coorg, Karnataka, India](https://steemit.com/india/@codingdefined/my-weekend-trip-to-coorg-the-scotland-of-india). This image was taken from Nokia 6 (Secondary Camera - 16 MP).

![IMG_20170909_124100-2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmXJYh5qfcR1oHTcW24sLq4dzyEV7vfxRSX5RqDaDVBcYq/IMG_20170909_124100-2.jpg)

<hr>

### <center> Follow @codingdefined </center>
